headline: Datadog: A Strong Buy After The 42% Drop
summary: Datadog is a compelling growth stock with AI-driven profitability, strong margins, and a long runway to $8B sales by 2030. Click to read why DDOG is a Strong Buy.

headline: Should You Invest in Datadog (DDOG)?
summary: Parnassus Investments, an investment management company, released the “Parnassus Growth Equity Fund” fourth quarter 2024 investor letter. A copy of the letter can be downloaded here. In the fourth quarter, the Fund (Investor Shares) returned 4.85% (net of fees) underperforming the Russell 1000 Growth Index’s 7.07% gain. For the year, the fund returned 26.85% compared […]
